segments.text: Sorry to bother you sir , but I have some bad news .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the stock market just took a huge plunge and we ’ Ve lost a lot of money !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean ? What happened ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are many factors that weigh in , but NASDAQ is down 200 points , the DOW JONES indicator also suffered ! Our portfolio is worth half of what it was worth points week ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How is this possible ? You are supposed to be talking to our stockbrokers and making sure that our securities and investments are safe and making a profitable return !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know sir ! We didn ’ t expect a bull market to become a bear market all of a sudden . On the other hand , you still have some high yield trash bonds and government bonds that will give us enough liquidity to cut our loses and reinvest in emerging markets . We could potentially make this tragedy work for us and make us think outside the box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do what you have to do ! One other thing , don ’ t tell the rest of the stockholders about this . If they find out , it ’ s the end of this company !
segments.speaker: S2
